concept.title: Metric Types
concept.shortdesc: Metric alerts provide different types of alerts based on the metric type that you select.

conbody.p: For example, when you select a counter type, you can create alerts based on the number of error records generated by a specific stage.

Metric alerts include the following metric types:
Counter Provides metric alerts based on a count for any stage in the pipeline. You can create alerts for the following count types:
Input records
Output records
Bad records
Stage errors
Histogram
